title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Raw honesty is the most useful path forward today. The truth is a much-needed transformation in a relationship probably goes better if you both surrender to it. Maybe neither of you wants to admit that your feelings for each other have evolved for fear that your confession could disrupt your current arrangement. However, trusting that you both will find your way to a new normal is easier when you honor the current dynamics without fear. Greek philosopher Heraclitus wrote, Change is the only constant in life. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
